name: Not Fast Enough
description:
This is a fast-paced, twin stick shooter game where you play as a little polygon being hunted down by other, less cute polygons. Not only do you have nowhere to run, but you've also come to the realization that you're not fast enough. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------CONTROLLER HIGHLY RECOMMENDED 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

WASD - Move

ARROW KEYS - Shoot 

"C" - Dash
